name: Race Management for SugarCRM
short_description:
The purpose of this project is to create a SugarCRM module that will allow for easier tracking of events, participation, and accumulated points earned during points races.

While initially intended to be used for racing events, it could be easily modified to handle other types of events as well with some changes in the Studio section of the Admin panel.

The package is based on the following model:

- Events - this is the actual event that is being tracked.
- For each event, there are Participants
- Each Participant can register for different race classes with one or more vehicles
- Results are entered at the end of each class to record scores.

The system is designed to be used with the AlineaSol Reporting module for reporting on costs, accumulated points, etc.

Currently only tested on SugarCRM CE 6.2.4

Since this is a work in progress, be kind :)
summary: A SugaCRM CE module to help manage competitive events.
